title: Mini! Kiznaiver Gekijou
original_name: みにっ! きずないーばー劇場
sinopse:
An official gag comic for the TV anime, Kiznaiver appears! In this gag comic, all of the characters have turned mini, and live out unbelievable days in Sugomori City. You get to enjoy a slightly different story from the original.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
